I just tried crawling your problematic URL with Heritrix HEAD and I do 
not get an NPE.  What OS and version of Heritrix are you using?  Here's 
my evidence that it works fine for me:

Regards your 'HEAD -e' experience, seems like this site serves 
differently dependent on user-agent volunteered.   Here is wget with 
default user-agent:

stack@debord:~/workspace/heritrix/jobs/default-20061127170142701$ wget 
--verbose http://www.gnnetcom.es/es/es
--09:21:14--  http://www.gnnetcom.es/es/es
           => `es.1'
Resolving www.gnnetcom.es... 12.105.84.103
Connecting to www.gnnetcom.es|12.105.84.103|:80... connected.
HTTP request sent, awaiting response... 302 Found
Location: /website/Templates/ClientMessage [following]
--09:21:15--  http://www.gnnetcom.es/website/Templates/ClientMessage
           => `ClientMessage'
Reusing existing connection to www.gnnetcom.es:80.
HTTP request sent, awaiting response... 404 Not Found
09:21:15 ERROR 404: Not Found.

If I use same user-agent as I'm using in Heritrix, I get different response:


stack@debord:~/workspace/heritrix/jobs/default-20061127170142701$ wget 
--verbose --user-agent="Mozilla/5.0 (compatible)" 
http://www.gnnetcom.es/es/es
--09:20:29--  http://www.gnnetcom.es/es/es
           => `es'
Resolving www.gnnetcom.es... 12.105.84.103
Connecting to www.gnnetcom.es|12.105.84.103|:80... connected.
HTTP request sent, awaiting response... 200 OK
Length: 40,834 (40K) [text/html]

100%[==================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================>] 
40,834        75.10K/s            

09:20:30 (74.93 KB/s) - `es' saved [40834/40834]


Yours,
St.Ack


callforshadab wrote:
>
> Hi,
> while crawling the site :
> http://www.gnnetcom.es/ <http://www.gnnetcom.es/>
>
> java.lang.NullPointerException
> Stacktrace: java.lang.NullPointerException
> at java.util.Hashtable.put(Hashtable.java:396)
> at st.ata.util.HashtableAList.putString(HashtableAList.java:250)
> at
> org.archive.crawler.datamodel.CandidateURI.putString(CandidateURI.java:548)
> at org.archive.crawler.fetcher.FetchDNS.innerProcess(FetchDNS.java:194)
> at org.archive.crawler.framework.Processor.process(Processor.java:103)
> at
> org.archive.crawler.framework.ToeThread.processCrawlUri(ToeThread.java:355)
> at org.archive.crawler.framework.ToeThread.run(ToeThread.java:173)
>
> And when i tried to see the header of this site on linux using HEAD
> command, output is as
>
> HEAD -e http://www.gnnetcom.es/ <http://www.gnnetcom.es/>
> 500 Can't connect to :80 (Bad hostname '')
> Client-Date: Fri, 24 Nov 2006 09:58:01 GMT
>
> Why it is returning null for this host, while the site is working.
>
> Regards
>
>
